text: Robert Patrick "Bob" Casey, Jr. (born April 13, 1960) is an American attorney and politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He served as the United States Senator from Pennsylvania from 2007 to 2025. He previously served as Pennsylvania Auditor General from 1997 to 2005 and as Pennsylvania Treasurer from 2005 to 2007. Casey was diagnosed with prostate cancer in January 2023. Casey lost his re-election campaign to Republican businessman David McCormick in November 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== *Senator Robert P. title: Bob Casey Jr.
